title: Brandon Miele, Art and Fear, and the Growth Generated by Uncertainty
description:
Brandon and I discuss the role faith plays in our art and life.
We share the same struggles with uncertainty.
You can find Brandon on Instagram @Brandon.P.Miele

We mention the great book Art and Fear by Orland and Bayles

Karen's website:  www.karenwongart.com

Website about Jordan Peterson:
www.themeaningcode.com
